about_the_game:
Get more out of Signed and Sealed With a Kiss in this adorable .PDF art book! Includes illustrations from both the base game and expansion pack, as well as promotional artworks.

FEATURES

  • Over 40 pages of illustrations, sketches, and development commentary
  • Get a peek at never-before-seen illustrations
  • Official full-game walkthrough integrated into the book
  • Exclusive article detailing our future plans for Signed and Sealed With a Kiss

content_descriptors.notes: Some illustrations may contain partial male nudity.
